variable.name: vSC_date_CalendarYearField
variable.description: This variable will be used in the CalendarYear list box and will change the field based on the value in the vSC_DateType field

variable.name: vSC_date_FiscalYearField
variable.description: This variable will be used in the Fiscal Year list box and will change the field based on the value in the vSC_DateType field>Test

variable.name: vSC_date_QuarterField
variable.description: This variable will be used in the Quarter list box and will change the field based on the value in the vSC_DateType field

variable.name: vSC_date_PeriodField
variable.description: This variable will be used in the Period list box and will change the field based on the value in the vSC_DateType field

variable.name: vSC_date_MonthField
variable.description: This variable will be used in the Month list box and will change the field based on the value in the vSC_DateType field

variable.name: vSC_date_DayOfMonthField
variable.description: This variable will be used in the Day of Month list box and will change the field based on the value in the vSC_DateType field

variable.name: vSC_date_CalendarDateField
variable.description: This variable will be used in the CalendarDate list box and will change the field based on the value in the vSC_DateType field

variable.name: vSC_date_WeekField
variable.description: This variable will be used in the Week list box and will change the field based on the value in the vSC_DateType field

variable.name: vSC_date_DayOfWeekField
variable.description: This variable will be used in the Day of Week list box and will change the field based on the value in the vSC_DateType field

variable.name: vSC_date_HolidayField
variable.description: This variable will be used in the Holiday list box and will change the field based on the value in the vSC_DateType field

variable.name: vSC_date_FLAG_YTD
variable.description: This variable will be used to allow users to set the YTD flag for the values in the vSC_DateType field

variable.name: mod_CY
variable.description: Formula Modifier for Current Year based on the SelectYear variable and taking into account whether user has selected Fiscal Or Calendar Year This variable will be used in the Formulas spreadsheet to modify existing formulas/expression.

variable.name: mod_PY
variable.description: Formula Modifier for Previous Year based on the SelectYear variable and taking into account whether user has selected Fiscal Or Calendar Year This variable will be used in the Formulas spreadsheet to modify existing formulas/expression.

variable.name: mod_YTD
variable.description: Formula Modifier for YTD flag. Will only return transactions that have the YTD flag set to TRUE. It will take into account the type of date being used by the user (Insert, Posting or Create)

variable.name: mod_Prev_YTD
variable.description: Formula Modifier for the Previous YTD flag. Will only return transactions that have the Previous YTD flag set to TRUE. It will take into account the type of date being used by the user (Insert, Posting or Create)

variable.name: vinputAccrualStartDate
variable.description: Defines the beginning date for the report

variable.name: vinputAccrualEndDate
variable.description: Defines the ending date for the report

variable.name: vandProd_ProductSet
variable.expression: ='SUM({<$(vAndProd_ProductSetAcctOrAdOrder)=' & Concat(Distinct {$} '{"=COUNT({<ProductName={' & chr(39) & ProductName, chr(39) & '}>} AccountNumber_AdBase)>0"}*') & chr(39) & '}>} $(vAndProd_ProductSetAcctOrAdOrder))>0"}$(vAndProd_ProductClear)>} $(NetRevenue))'

variable.name: vChurnPrevYear
variable.description: AGGR function that returns revenue for customers in Previous Year

variable.name: vChurnCurrYear
variable.description: AGGR function that returns revenue for customers in Current Year

variable.name: vChurnType
variable.description: If MONTH, then show Churn by Month chart; if YOY, show YOY Churn

variable.name: vChurnDynCurrMonth
variable.description: Used for Monthly Churn calculations (this is the current Month formula)

variable.name: vChurnDynPrevMonth
variable.description: Used for Monthly Churn calculations (this is the previous Month formula)

variable.name: vChurnDynMonthField
variable.description: Dynamic field for the Month field in the monthly churn chart

variable.name: vShowTotals
variable.description: Flag to be used when using code to show and hide totals in a pivot table. In base version this is only in the Preprint report on the Advertising tab as an example.

variable.name: vsysCurrentSelections
variable.expression: =if(vsysShowCS = 1, ' Click Here To Hide', if(isnull(GetCurrentSelections()), ' Nothing selected', GetCurrentSelections(' | ', ': ', ',',0)))
variable.description: Used in the DisplayCurrent Selections boxes.

variable.name: vsysShowCS
variable.description: Flag to determine if we should show or hide a current selections object

variable.name: vsysFormulaCreatorTemp
variable.description: A variable that will hold the formula being created by Formula Creator.

variable.name: vLoadOldAcctNums
variable.description: Flag to determine if we should load old accountnumbers

variable.name: vReloadVariables
variable.description: Used in SOURCE_ to determine if this spreadsheet should be reloaded. Turned on and off in the application NOT here.

variable.name: vLoadCRM
variable.description: Used in SOURCE_ to determine if CRM data will be loaded. Turned on and off in the application NOT here.

variable.name: vLoadPRPSchedule
variable.description: Used in SOURCE_ to determine if Preprint schedule information from Core will be loaded. Turned on and off in the application NOT here.

variable.name: vLoadBudget
variable.description: Used in SOURCE_ to determine if Budget spreadsheet information will be loaded. Turned on and off in the application NOT here.

variable.name: vLoadCustomScripts
variable.description: Used in SOURCE_ to determine if Custom Scripts should be loaded. If true, Source file will look in CustomScripts\SalesFlash\*.qvs

variable.name: vExcludeGLs
variable.description: Used in SOURCE_ to determine if ExcludeGLs information should be read and processed from the SystemSheet.xls -> GLExcludeList

variable.name: vLoadAdvRevenue
variable.description: Used in SOURCE_ to determine if we are to load revenue from the fctInsertSummary and Detail tables. Can increase load times significantly

variable.name: vShowHelp
variable.description: Used to show and hide help text boxes.

variable.name: vsysButtonColorOn
variable.description: On sheets with a button bar down the side, this will be the color of the button selected.

variable.name: vsysButtonColorOff
variable.description: On sheets with a button bar down the side, this will be the color of the buttons NOT selected.

variable.name: vLastActivityDate
variable.description: Return the most recent (could even be in the future depending on expression) insertion date for every customer. This expression will return the last insert date for customers and could be in the future: =DATE(AGGR(MAX({1} InsertCalendarDate),AccountNumber_AdBase)) You can also limit the dates that the expression looks for the last insertion. The expression below will search for the last insert date before one month ago Today. =DATE(AGGR(MAX({1} InsertCalendarDate),AccountNumber_AdBase))

variable.name: vOSUser
variable.description: User logged into the application.

variable.name: SelectYear
variable.description: Used for Year over Year caclulations

variable.name: vFiscalOrCalendarYear
variable.description: Allows the user to do YOY comparisons based on the Fiscal or Calendar Year. Will be either Posting_CalendarYear or Insert_CalendarYear. Sample Dimension Usage: =$(=$(vFiscalOrCalendarYear)) Sample Expression Usage: SUM( {<$(=$(vFiscalOrCalendarYear)) = {$(=$(SelectYear))}>} $(NetRevenue))

variable.name: vFiscalOrCalendarYearLabel
variable.description: Label for the List boxes, Dimensions and Expressions that use the Dynamic Year and month/period fields

variable.name: vFiscalOrCalendarMonthPeriod
variable.description: Dynamic field that can be used in Dimensions. This will allow the user to select whether they see Insert/posting/create and Calendar(month) or Fiscal(period). =$(=$(vFiscalOrCalendarMonthPeriod))

variable.name: vFiscalOrCalendarMonthPeriodLabel
variable.description: Label to be used for the charts that use this Dynamic Dimension

variable.name: vFiscalOrCalendarPrevYTD
variable.description: Sets the YTD Flag based on the Date settings - Controlled by YTDSwitch Macro Capitalize('$(vSC_DateType)') & '_FLAG_PreviousYTD'

variable.name: vFiscalOrCalendarYTD
variable.description: Sets the YTD Flag based on the Date settings - Controlled by YTDSwitch Macro Capitalize('$(vSC_DateType)') & '_FLAG_YTD'

variable.name: vsysShowAdvancedSheets
variable.description: When true, shows the Formulas, Formula Creator and Tables and Fields sheets.

variable.name: vbtnsFinance
variable.description: Controls which reports are showing on the Finance sheet

variable.name: vbtnsAdvertising
variable.description: Controls which reports are showing on the Advertising sheet

variable.name: vbtnsReference
variable.description: Controls which reports are showing on the Reference sheet

variable.name: vbtnsCRM
variable.description: Controls which reports are showing on the CRM sheet

variable.name: vTab
variable.description: Used on Selection Criteria tab to determine which side tab is active. OPTIONS: DateActive, ProductActive, SalesActive or OtherActive

variable.name: vQSTab
variable.description: Used on all reporting tabs to determine which Quick Selection Ribbon tab is active. OPTIONS: DateActive, ProductActive, SalesActive, GLActive or OtherActive

variable.name: vSC_DateType
variable.description: Holds either INSERT, POSTING or CREATE. Used to dynamically change Date List boxes.

variable.name: vFiscalOrCalendarFlag
variable.description: 0=Calendar, 1=Fiscal

variable.name: vGL_BUCKET_1
variable.description: The Expression here will be the new field name for use in SalesFlash.qvw

variable.name: vGL_BUCKET_2
variable.description: The Expression here will be the new field name for use in SalesFlash.qvw

variable.name: vGL_BUCKET_3
variable.description: The Expression here will be the new field name for use in SalesFlash.qvw - You do NOT need to fill in all of these

variable.name: vGL_BUCKET_4
variable.description: The Expression here will be the new field name for use in SalesFlash.qvw - You do NOT need to fill in all of these

variable.name: vGL_BUCKET_5
variable.description: The Expression here will be the new field name for use in SalesFlash.qvw - You do NOT need to fill in all of these

variable.name: vGL_BUCKET_6
variable.description: The Expression here will be the new field name for use in SalesFlash.qvw - You do NOT need to fill in all of these

variable.name: vinputTopNNN
variable.description: User entered, number of top/bottom performers to show.

variable.name: vInactiveDays
variable.description: Used along with the vLastActivityDate to determine if a customer should be returned on the "inactive customer" report. This will be the initial number of Inactive Days shown.

variable.name: vsheet_Finance
variable.description: 1 = Show Sheet; 0 = Hide Sheet

variable.name: vsheet_Advertising
variable.description: 1 = Show Sheet; 0 = Hide Sheet

variable.name: vsheet_RevCompare
variable.description: 1 = Show Sheet; 0 = Hide Sheet

variable.name: vsheet_Budget
variable.description: 1 = Show Sheet; 0 = Hide Sheet

variable.name: vShowAdvancedSheets
variable.description: Shows/hides Reference Charts, Tables & Fields, Formulas, Formula Creator tabs

variable.name: vDaysInPreviousYear
variable.description: Returns the number of days in the CurrentYear -1 (Previous Year)

variable.name: vGaugeFillToSegment1
variable.description: First segment of Gauge from Zero to Lower bound of Segment2.

variable.name: vGaugeFillToSegment2
variable.description: Second segment of Gauge from Lower bound of Segment2 to end.

variable.name: vGaugeFillToOverSegment
variable.description: This is the color of the whole gauge if the expression exceeds the bounds. If gauge is from 0 to 100 and we have 142, this color would show.

variable.name: vGaugeSegmentOrange
variable.description: Segment will be Orange

variable.name: vGaugeSegmentRed
variable.description: Gauge segment Red

variable.name: vGaugeSegmentGreen
variable.description: Gauge segment will be green

variable.name: vRevBand1
variable.description: Revenue Band 1

variable.name: vRevBand2
variable.description: Revenue Band 2

variable.name: vRevBand3
variable.description: Revenue Band 3

variable.name: vRevBand4
variable.description: Revenue Band 4

variable.name: vRevBand5
variable.description: Revenue Band 5

variable.name: vRevBand6
variable.description: Revenue Band 6

variable.name: vRevBand7
variable.description: Revenue Band 7

variable.name: vRevBand1Label
variable.description: Label for Revenue Band 1

variable.name: vRevBand2Label
variable.description: Label for Revenue Band 2

variable.name: vRevBand3Label
variable.description: Label for Revenue Band 3

variable.name: vRevBand4Label
variable.description: Label for Revenue Band 4

variable.name: vRevBand5Label
variable.description: Label for Revenue Band 5

variable.name: vRevBand6Label
variable.description: Label for Revenue Band 6

variable.name: vRevBand7Label
variable.description: Label for Revenue Band 7

variable.name: vRevBand0Label
variable.description: Label for Revenue Band 0

variable.name: vBandList
variable.expression: =IF (len(vRevBand1)>0, chr(39) & 'vRevBand1' & chr(39)) & IF (len(vRevBand2)>0, ',' & chr(39) & 'vRevBand2' & chr(39)) & IF (len(vRevBand3)>0, ',' & chr(39) & 'vRevBand3' & chr(39)) & IF (len(vRevBand4)>0, ',' & chr(39) & 'vRevBand4' & chr(39)) & IF (len(vRevBand5)>0, ',' & chr(39) & 'vRevBand5' & chr(39)) & IF (len(vRevBand6)>0, ',' & chr(39) & 'vRevBand6' & chr(39)) & IF (len(vRevBand7)>0, ',' & chr(39) & 'vRevBand7' & chr(39))
variable.description: Dynamic List of Revenue Bands used
variable.notes: Used so user doesn't need to enter all bands. This will create a list of used bands.

variable.name: vBandDim
variable.expression: =concat( 'IF(AGGR($(_NetRevenue_CY), AccountNumber_AdBase)<$' & chr(40) & ValueList($(vBandList)) & chr(41) & ', dual(vRevBand' & (Right(ValueList($(vBandList)), 1)-1) & 'Label, ' & (Right(ValueList($(vBandList)), 1)-1) & chr(41), ',' ) & ', dual(vRevBand' & (substringcount( vBandList , ',') + 1) & 'Label, ' & (substringcount( vBandList , ',') + 1) & ')' & Repeat(chr(41), substringcount( vBandList , ',') +1)
variable.description: expression that builds the dimension for the revenue bands

variable.name: vFiscalOrCalendarMonthPeriodNum
variable.description: Dynamci field that can be used in dimensions. This will select either Insert/Posting/Create MonthOfYearNumber or PeriodOfYearNumber

variable.name: vdynYTD_MonthPeriodFinalCalc
variable.description: Final caclulation for the dynamic YTD expression. It will return either the greatest ..._Month selected as a number or the greatest ..._PeriodOfYearNumber based on the vFiscalOrCalendarFlag setting.

variable.name: vdynYTD_getGreatestMonthPeriod
variable.description: For use in the vdynYTD_MonthPeriodFinalCalc variable expression. It will return either the greatest Month from ..._Month or Period from ..._PeriodOfYearNumber

variable.name: vLoadAgingData
variable.description: Option to load Aging Data
variable.notes: Will load data from the core database tables AgingCustomer, AgingDetail and AgingOptions

variable.name: btnPleaseDeleteMe
variable.description: This is a test
